channel.title: When players log in... READ to undertsnad
channel.description:
hi when you first log in to some servers.. your wielding like i have freescape sorce has d legs v brassy blue phat etc could you tell em what folder and how to chnge it?i will tell yuo what i want it to chnge to..
black cav (helmet) cape of legends (cape) desert boots (boots) cooking gauntlets (gloves) black (t) platebody (platebody) black d'hide chaps (platelegs) berserker ring (ring) amulet of glory (amulet) NO SHIELD! abyssal whip (weapon) NO AMMO (ARROWS)
IF YOU CAN DO THIS FOR ME I WILL GIVE YOU AN ADMIN ON MY SERVER (CANT TWLL YUO BECAUSE THREAD MAY GET LOCKED) BUT JUST DO HAMATCHI MY NAME IS " PK FOR ME " TY

item.title: When players log in... READ to undertsnad
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

ok add this into your player.java youll have to find the already existing one and replace it with this

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704; playerEquipment[playerChest]=2583; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2497; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6737; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

that should be correct if its not im sorry

~Metal~

Read full topic
item.source: When players log in... READ to undertsnad
